snippet.title: Slider - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A free demo is available on Steam now! It would mean the world if you could try it out, wishlist the game, or tell a friend!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1916890/Slider/

Slider is a free, indie, puzzle exploration game based on 8 puzzle. Manipulate the world in order to solve puzzles and help others. You will manage an ever-growing set of tiles and mechanics as you explore unique areas and unravel the mysteries of the universe.

Music by @EcclipseMusic
